page.title: 16OUTDOOR SPORTS
page.content: Although Stromness is quite small it has plenty of leisure facilities for most interests and ages. Messing about in boats and sailing are summer activities provided by the sea. A thrivivg Sailing Club has Regattas down Scapa Flow.Pony trekking at Garson farm is another outdoor sport for all ages. Mr. Flett looks after the 18 hole golf course built about 50 years ago at Ness. It has 100 members who regularly play. Many tourists play and enjoy easy access to the course. There's no age limit. It costs Â£16 for under 16s and Â£50 for adults. Next door is the local bowling green with an active membership. The tennis courts next to it are usually in much use about Wimbledon time. All the outdoor activities are very much at the mercy of our changeable climate.
